column1: We love our dogs. They love to race.
MITCHAM NIKORIMA (1) - began awkwardly making contact with HOMEBUSH JOZIE.
HOMEBUSH DURANT (3) - checked from behind entering the bend losing momentum.
KIPJO (4) - checked off heels early stages. Awkwardly placed on heels entering the bend having to check making contact with the heels of HOMEBUSH FONZIE.
HOMEBUSH FONZIE (6) - slow early. Checked from behind entering the bend losing momentum.
HOMEBUSH JOZIE (9/2) - contacted from the inside by MITCHAM NIKORIMA on jumping losing momentum.
Due to the inclement weather the back straight camera was of limited use for the purpose of reporting this race.
HOMEBUSH BEDE (3) - bumped with HOMEBUSH SHOWOFF early stages and again entering the bend.
HOMEBUSH GAMBLER (4) - shifted up the track early stages hampering outside runners. Jostled with SAVAGE KNIGHT exiting the bend.
SAVAGE KNIGHT (5) - boxed first. Squeezed for racing room early stages after being slow away. Jostled with HOMEBUSH GAMBLER exiting the bend.
MITCHAM QUEEN (7) - came down the track early stages colliding with HOMEBUSH GAMBLER losing balance and ground. Referred to the Veterinarian and cleared of injury.
HOMEBUSH SHOWOFF (8) - bumped with HOMEBUSH BEDE early stages and again entering the bend.
CHICAGO HEAD (1) - jostled with HOMEBUSH VELMA prior to the bend.
HOMEBUSH VELMA (2) - placed in tight quarters in the run to the bend before jostling with CHICAGO HEAD. Awkwardly placed on heels entering the bend.
OPAWA DI (5) - jostled with COSMIC MARTY early stages.
COSMIC MARTY (6) - jostled with OPAWA DI early stages. Squeezed for racing room entering the bend losing ground.

column5: Owned/Raced by: D Lane & J Arthur

column1: HOMEBUSH GEORGE (3) - forced down the track early stages. Squeezed for racing room entering the bend being dragged down and losing ground. Referred to the Veterinarian and cleared of injury.
SOZIN'S SYMPHONY (4) - contacted from the outside early stages being bumped down the track in consequence. Jostled with COOL BEANS prior to the bend losing ground.
COOL BEANS (6) - dictated down the track early stages. Jostled with SOZIN'S SYMPHONY prior to the bend.
LUCKY SCAR (7) - slow early. Hampered entering the bend.
OPAL HUNTER (8) - shifted down the track early stages hampering inside runners.
VOLCANIC WHISPER (3) - squeezed between runners early stages.
SILOUETTE JET (6) - shifted up the track in the run to the bend dictating BRUISER'S DAY wide.
BRUISER'S DAY (8) - dictated up the track in the run to the bend before changing ground inwards losing momentum.

column5: Owned/Raced by: RH Adcock & RG Amer

column1: EDDIE HEMI (1) - bumped with LAKOTA KOHANA entering the bend.
OPAWA SWEET (2) - jostled with HOMEBUSH SAYER early stages.
HOMEBUSH SAYER (3) - jostled with OPAWA SWEET early stages.

PUNTERS LAST (4) - jostled with HOMEBUSH SAYER early stages before being bumped from the outside by DOUBLE SPEED. Awkwardly placed on heels prior to the bend losing momentum for a stride. Weakened final stages.
LAKOTA KOHANA (5) - bumped with EDDIE HEMI entering the bend.
DOUBLE SPEED (6) - shifted down the track early stages bumping with PUNTERS LAST.
OPAWA LAWSEY (7) - awkwardly placed on heels entering the bend losing momentum for a stride.
REIGN OF FIRE (6) - boxed first.Shouldered with MACHINE GUNN entering the bend losing ground. Awkwardly placed on heels shortly afterwards.
MACHINE GUNN (7) - bumped briefly with PUNCH ON BUZZ prior to the bend. Shouldered with REIGN OF FIRE entering the bend losing ground.
PUNCH ON BUZZ (8) - bumped briefly with MACHINE GUNN prior to the bend losing ground.
HOMEBUSH FINN (3) - hampered prior to the bend.
MAGIC JESS LASS (6) - had heels clipped early stages. Checked and lost ground entering the bend.
SOZIN'S AZURE (7) - checked inwards clipping heels early stages.

column5: Owned/Raced by: JT McInerney & M Thompson

column1: HOMEBUSH SURGEON (6) - slow early stages before racing wide losing ground.

column5: Owned/Raced by: JT McInerney & M Thompson

column1: KHATIA (2) - placed on heels entering bend.
BLACK DAN (7) - placed on heels entering bend.
LAKOTA MICCO (1) - placed in restricted room entering the bend having to check.
HOMEBUSH BOMBER (5) - hampered early stages. Squeezed for room prior to the bend having to steady.
MITCHAM SAM (6) - hampered early stages losing ground.
BRUT MAGIC (7) - came down the track early stages hampering inside runners.
